Package model

Class UndoRedoManager

java.lang.Object
model.UndoRedoManager
public class UndoRedoManager extends Object
UndoRedoManager: Manages undo and redo functionality for user actions. This class is responsible for managing the undo and redo functionality for user actions. It maintains two stacks, one for undoing actions and another for redoing actions. Users can undo the most recent action and redo previously undone actions.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Doom Al Rajhi and Tanay Desai

  • Method Details

    • undo

      public javafx.scene.image.WritableImage undo(javafx.scene.image.WritableImage image)
      Undo the most recent action.
      Parameters:
      image - The current state of the canvas as a WritableImage.
      Returns:
      The state of the canvas before the undo operation as a WritableImage. Returns null if there's nothing to undo.

    • redo

      public javafx.scene.image.WritableImage redo(javafx.scene.image.WritableImage image)
      Redo the previously undone action.
      Parameters:
      image - The current state of the canvas as a WritableImage.
      Returns:
      The state of the canvas after the redo operation as a WritableImage. Returns null if there's nothing to redo.

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Check if there are actions that can be undone.
      Returns:
      true if there are actions that can be undone, false otherwise.

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Check if there are actions that can be redone.
      Returns:
      true if there are actions that can be redone, false otherwise.
